text: Edgardo "Eddie" U. Ilarde (August 25, 1934 â€“ August 4, 2020) was a Filipino radio-television host and politician. He was born in Iriga, Camarines Sur. He was a member of the Liberal Party. He hosted Student Canteen. From 1965 to 1969, he was a member of the House of Representatives. In 1972, he was a member of the Senate. Ilarde died on August 4, 2020 at a hospital in Makati, Philippines at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Filipino entertainers Category:Politicians from Camarines Sur
title: Eddie Ilarde
